text:
Vaynah dialect (Chechen: Вайнех диялэкти)
Classification.
Vaynah dialect is the extinct dialect. Like this word: Шемиж used Шамэз for the vaynah dialect. The glottal stop is used for Ъ letter. Not a two symbol (") because it is the extinct dialect of Chechen.
Word changes.
According to a (the) Omniglot,it is uses the extinct dialect after Grozny dialect. Omniglot says that is after a Grozny dialect,so uses the Chechen language.
